Name: Finastra
description: Finastra Job Role: Graduate Engineer Trainee CTC: 7.5 LPA Requirements: • A desire to learn and grow professionally across one or various functions within the firm • Knowledge in Business, Computer Science, Computer/Software Engineering, E&TC, or related disciplines • Knowledge of variety of coding languages a plus (eg, HTML/HTML5,Java, C++, JavaScript, JQuery, CSS, XML, WCF, ASP.NET MVC, XSLT, Windows Services, MSMQ, AngularJS 2, ASP.NET Web API, BootStrap, TypeScript, GIT, Kentico) • Strong communication skills • Curious and comfortable with ambiguity • Flexibility and ability to work in a fast-paced environment • Demonstrated problem solving and analytical skills • Self-starter, ability to work in a virtual environment as needed

Name: DE Shaw & Co
description: DE Shaw & Co Job Role: Front Office Tech Associate We are looking for a resourceful candidate to join our Front Office Technology group based in Hyderabad. The team specializes in building high quality applications and web-based products with a focus on usability, speed, security, and productivity. Compensation and Benefits Package: Base INR 12,25,000 Variable* INR 1,50,000 - INR 2,00,000 Benefits INR 5,30,000 Relocation Allowance** INR 2,00,000 Joining Bonus INR 1,50,000 Compensation and Benefits Package - INR 22,55,000 – INR 23,05,000 • Lower amount is guaranteed, higher amount is dependent on performance. • Relocation will entail reimbursement on travel (in full), guest house stay for 14 nights & reimbursement of movement of household goods, brokerage; on actuals up to a maximum of INR 50,000 Location: Hyderabad What you will do day-to-day: • Address queries from the trading floor and other related front office entities on data and software owned by Front Office Tech. • Build and maintain reports and metrics related to accuracy of our data and performance of software. • Partner with cross functional operations and technology teams to solve problems and identify improvement opportunities • Work closely with technology developers on fixing issues that are critical to the business, document, and track all changes in production. • Drive requirements and organize documents related to operational activities as well as new initiatives that will improve business operations. • Escalate issues to the developers that require code changes. Who we are looking for: • Min. cgpa of 7 in CS/IT group & 8 cgpa in circuit branches with no current backlogs. • The candidate should have an extraordinary record of academic achievements, excellent interpersonal, organizational, and analytical skills, along with exceptional verbal acuity and command of detail. • Candidates should possess excellent problem solving and logical reasoning skills as well as ability to adhere to timelines while delivering his/her responsibilities. • Exposure to scripting, shell commands and familiarity with at least one programming language like C, C++, Python, or Java. Good understanding of core CS concepts like databases, operating systems, and networking. • Understanding of the finance domain will be an added advantage. Internship Benefits Package • Stipend INR 1,02,083 per month • Benefits Company paid accommodation for 14 days • Insurance Coverage • Breakfast, Lunch, Snacks • Training • To and fro domestic air travel (up to INR 15,000) Selection Process: Round 1: Online Assessment • Coding: 3 que of medium difficulty. • Technical and Aptitude: MCQs on OOPS, DBMS, CN and aptitude questions as well. (DE Shaw aptitude test is generally considered hard.) Round 2: Technical Interview I Round 3: Technical Interview II Round 4: HR Interview

Name: EPAM
description: EPAM Job Role: SDE (Intern + FTE) CTC: 8 LPA, Stipend: 25k/month Location: Hyderabad Key Responsibilities as FTE: • Develop high-quality software design and architecture. • Identify, prioritize, and execute tasks in the software development lifecycle. • Develop tools and applications by producing clean, efficient code. • Automate tasks through appropriate tools and scripting. • Review and debug code • Perform validation and verification testing. • Collaborate with internal teams and stakeholders to fix and improve products. • Document development phases and monitor systems. • Ensure software is up to date with the latest technologies Requirements: • Good coding skills on Core Java and knowledge of OOPs, DBMS/SQL, Version Control Systems, Design Principles, Software Quality Engineering fundamentals • Problem Solving: Able to identify and solve complex problems in a structured manner, using Java. Strong fundamentals and deep practical knowledge of DSA preferred. • Possesses growth mindset and exhibits himself/herself as a motivated and organized self-learner and self-driven individual, and who can learn new programming language(s) and technologies when required. • Good verbal and written communication skills • Adaptability to fast-paced environments. • Should be a good team player • Commitment to ethical behaviour and integrity • BE / B. Tech in CS / IS / IT Engineering and MCA – 2025 graduated batch with 70% overall. • Open to work at any of the EPAM locations post Internship. Benefits: • Salary – Internship – 25,000 per month and Full Time – 8 LPA • Customizable insurance coverage • Professional development opportunities • Paid leave for maternity, paternity & bereavement • Retirement benefits like VPF and NPS • Digital meal cards • Hobby Clubs • Company's Social Events Selection Process: Round 1: Online Test (Coding (DSA) 180 mins, Aptitude ques 30 mins) Round 2: Group Discussion Round 3: Technical Interview - 2 rounds. Round 4: HR Interview Eligibility Criteria: BE / B. Tech in CS / IS / IT Engineering and MCA – 2026 Minimum 70% (X, XII, and Graduation) No Live Backlog

Name: Sagacious IP
description: About Sagacious IP: Sagacious IP is a global leader in Intellectual Property (IP) solutions, providing technical research and consulting services primarily focused on patents. We work with a diverse range of clients, including Fortune 500 companies, start-ups, international law firms, and corporate legal departments. Our expertise spans multiple Domains, such as Biotech, Pharma, Mechanical, Electronics, and Telecom. Our headquarters are located in Gurugram (Delhi NCR), where we are currently hiring. Job Role: Patent Analyst CTC: 5.5 LPA, Stipend: 18k/month Job Location: Gurugram Eligibility Criteria: Min. 65% or above in 10th, 12th & Graduation No Live Backlog Candidates will be required to sign a 12-month employment bond upon joining. Role: • Understanding the technology, product, or the invention. Discuss the same with the • seniors & the internal team. If required, discuss the invention with the inventors/researchers/patent lawyers/client over the conference call or in-person meeting to calibrate or to get more details. • Performing various patent searches - prior art search, novelty search, patentability • search, patent portfolio, patent landscaping, validity searches, sequence searches, • structure searches etc. • Conduct comprehensive searches of technical and patent information using online • database and other information resources. • Analyze and summarize search results • Provide insightful evaluation and analysis of results. • Preparing final reports and deliverables as per required standards • Deliver timely, value-added patent search reports. • Discuss the finding/results with the inventor/client over the conference call. • Helping the inventor/client to secure a patent or else, helping them to design-around • the product or the invention. Compensation and Employment Details: • Fixed CTC: INR 550,000 per annum upon successful completion of the 6-month training period at Sagacious IP and B.Tech degree. • Internship Stipend: INR 18,000 per month. The internship period may be extended by 1 month if performance is not satisfactory. • Bond: Candidates will be required to sign a 12-month employment bond upon joining. • Training Period: During this period, the intern's performance will be evaluated to confirm their role as a Patent Analyst. Mandatory Skills: Good analytical skills Good Technical Knowledge Good Interpersonal skill
